title: Munch Madness: McDonald's Round of 32 (Part 2) with Paul F. Tompkins
itunes:title: Munch Madness: McDonald's Round of 32 (Part 2) with Paul F. Tompkins
description:
Podcasting royalty Paul F. Tompkins (The Neigborhood Listen, Threedom) joins for the second round of Munch Madness 2020: The Tournament of Chompions - Mac Attack as we tackle the second half of the still alive McDonald’s menu items. Plus, our DoughCenter anchor Carl Tart gives a recap of the snacktion so far. And, we taste test Carl’s Jr./Hardee’s decadent new BFC.

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
